title: Cisco security advisory (AV25-253)
description: On May 7, 2025, Cisco published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in multiple products. Included were updates for the following products:
products: Integrated access points (APs) in Integrated Service Routers (ISR)1100 (Wi-Fi 6)
Catalyst 9800 Embedded Wireless Controller for Catalyst 9300, 9400, and 9500 Series Switches
Embedded Wireless Controller on Catalyst 9100X Access Points
Catalyst SD-WAN Manager  versions 20.8 and prior, 20.9, 20.10, 20.11, 20.12, 20.13, 20.14, 20.15, and 20.16
Wi-Fi 6 pluggable module for Catalyst IR1800 Rugged Series Routers
Cisco Industrial Ethernet 2000, 4000, 4010, and 5000 Series Switches
Cisco IOS, IOS XE, NX-OS and IOS XR Software
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
